lines.i: The template includes information, only provided if relevant, on an injury that contributed to the person's death.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.9"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:135)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:136)/@code="71481-6" Did the death of this person involve injury of any kind? (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:137)
An indication that the person's death resulted from an injury.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:138), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:139)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:140)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:144)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:145)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:146)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:148)/@code="11374-6" Injury incident description (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:149)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:152)
A record of the date and time that the injury occurred.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:147)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:151)
A text description of how the injury occurred.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:153)
An indicator that tells whether the death resulted from an injury.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant (CONF:154)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" (CONF:155)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:156)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:157)
The street address for the place where the injury occurred.
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ISDLOC" (CONF:158)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] scopingEntity (CONF:159)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PLC" (CONF:160)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] desc (CONF:163)
A description of the type of place where the injury occurred. Some possible entries include "at home", "farm", "factory", "office building", "restaurant".
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:161)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:141)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:164)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:165)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:166)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:168)/@code="69444-8" Did death result from injury at work (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:169)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:167)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:170)
An indicator that tells whether or not the injury occurred while the person was at work. Required if the decedent suffered an injury leading to death.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:142)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:171)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:172)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:173)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:175)/@code="69448-9" Injury leading to death associated with transportation event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:176)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:174)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:177)
An indicator that tells whether the injury leading to death was associated with a transportation event. Required if the decedent suffered an injury leading to death.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:143)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:178)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:179)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:180)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:182)/@code="69451-3" Transportation role of decedent (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:183)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:181)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:184), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Transportation Relationships (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6005 DYNAMIC (CONF:185)
A coded value that states, if the injury was related to transportation, the specific role played by the decedent, e.g. driver, passenger. Required if the decedent suffered an injury leading to death.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:135)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:136)/@code="71481-6" Did the death of this person involve injury of any kind? (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:137)
An indication that the person's death resulted from an injury.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:138), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:139)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:140)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:144)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:145)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:146)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:148)/@code="11374-6" Injury incident description (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:149)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:152)
A record of the date and time that the injury occurred.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:147)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:151)
A text description of how the injury occurred.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:153)
An indicator that tells whether the death resulted from an injury.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant (CONF:154)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" (CONF:155)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:156)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:157)
The street address for the place where the injury occurred.
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ISDLOC" (CONF:158)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] scopingEntity (CONF:159)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PLC" (CONF:160)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] desc (CONF:163)
A description of the type of place where the injury occurred. Some possible entries include "at home", "farm", "factory", "office building", "restaurant".
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:161)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:141)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:164)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:165)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:166)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:168)/@code="69444-8" Did death result from injury at work (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:169)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:167)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:170)
An indicator that tells whether or not the injury occurred while the person was at work. Required if the decedent suffered an injury leading to death.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:142)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:171)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:172)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:173)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:175)/@code="69448-9" Injury leading to death associated with transportation event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:176)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:174)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:177)
An indicator that tells whether the injury leading to death was associated with a transportation event. Required if the decedent suffered an injury leading to death.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:143)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:178)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:179)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:180)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:182)/@code="69451-3" Transportation role of decedent (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:183)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:181)
